page.title: 09LAW AND ORDER _ Policeman
page.content: { {A day in the life of a policeman { 7.00am I start my day and report for duty. 8.17am I walk to Newgate Street. There's a stolen car in Cucumber Lane. I report to HQ 10.00am I walk to Tolmers Store in Newgate Street for coffee. 11.00am Newpark Road- Check house owners away. 11.15am Man without gun certificate. 11.38am Left for Essendon. 12.15pm Lower Woodside_ talked to local resident. 1.05pm Woodman Wild Hill_ talked to publican. 1.15pm Visit Camfield Place. 1.35pm Arrive at Essendon for lunch. 2.35pm Complete paper work. 3.00pm Off duty.
